name: 06 OCTOBER forever and always
bio: "06 October Forever And Always" is a love song that captures a beautiful journey of memories from one October to the next. This heartfelt track expresses the emotions of falling in love in October and cherishing those moments forever.  Itâ€™s a melody of love, warmth, and deep connection, perfect for those who have fallen in love during this enchanting time of year. Relive the sweet moments of love with this heart-touching track.
